projects: [{"title":"Amazon ML Challenge 2023","start_date":"Apr 2023","end_date":"May 2023","description":"•  Implemented a ML model using Logistic Regression to predict a Product's Length based on it's description, resulting in a score of 39.1315•  Successfully achieved 86th position among a competitive field of 5000+ teams, solidifying an impressive place within the coveted top 1%"},{},{},{"title":"TSG Website Hackathon 2021","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"•  Developed an user-friendly Event Management Platform with MongoDB as the backend database, resulting in a 40% faster data retrieval•  Successfully achieved the esteemed Best Feature Award, standing out among all the participants and securing a position in the top 1%"},{},{"title":"Custom T-Shirt Design Tool","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"•  Designed &  developed a Custom T-Shirt Design tool using Fabric.JS and Angular.JS, enabling users to create random designs on apparel•  Utilized Firebase hosting for seamless & efficient deployment of the t-Shirt design tool, ensuring accessibility & smooth user experience•  Incorporated Formspree integration for efficient data collection from the Contact Form, enhancing user communication and feedback"}]
